title: Homepage Hero Section Animation and Interaction
description: Verify the animated hero section displays typed headline correctly, parallax effect functions smoothly, and call-to-action buttons respond properly on desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage
Check that the typed headline animation starts and completes correctly
Verify parallax and scroll-fading hero image overlay animates smoothly on desktop
Confirm call-to-action buttons are visible and clickable
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions
Verify animations are disabled or adapted for mobile
Confirm call-to-action buttons respond to touch input

title: Header Navigation Accessibility and Functionality
description: Ensure the global responsive header navigation supports dual-action menu, smooth scroll to page sections, keyboard navigation, and dropdown expansions.

steps.description: Load any page
Verify header navigation displays correctly on desktop
Activate dual-action menu and verify smooth scroll to 'About' section
Confirm correct page section is visible after scroll
Use keyboard (Tab and Enter keys) to open navigation menu and expand dropdowns
Verify keyboard focus states on menu items and dropdowns
Resize viewport to mobile and open menu
Verify mobile menu toggles and scroll navigation work as expected

title: About Page Content and Animations
description: Validate the About page renders mission, vision, team profiles, and that animated counters increment correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the About page
Check mission and vision text content matches specifications
Verify all team profiles are displayed with images and roles
Observe counters animate from zero to target numbers correctly
Resize viewport to mobile
Confirm all content and animations adapt responsively without overlap

title: Clients Page Carousel Desktop and Mobile
description: Test the interactive 3D circular carousel on desktop and vertical scroll carousel on mobile, ensuring smooth animations and correct client data display.

steps.description: Navigate to Clients page on desktop
Confirm 3D circular carousel renders with client logos and case snippets
Interact with carousel controls or drag to rotate clients
Verify smooth rotation and client data updates accordingly
Switch to mobile viewport and reload Clients page
Confirm vertical scroll carousel is visible with correct client logos and animations
Scroll through carousel items on mobile
Verify animations trigger on scroll and client info displays properly

title: Services Page Animation and Navigation
description: Verify animated service tiles display correctly and link to detailed service descriptions.

steps.description: Navigate to the Services page
Check all service tiles are displayed with animations triggering on page load and scroll
Click on multiple service tiles
Confirm navigation to respective detailed service description pages
Use keyboard navigation to focus and activate service tiles
Verify accessible focus states and activation works properly

title: Contact Form Validation and API Integration
description: Test the contact form inputs for real-time validation feedback, error handling, and successful submission via API.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact page
Attempt to submit the form with empty required fields
Verify real-time validation error messages appear for missing inputs
Enter invalid data formats (e.g., invalid email, too short message)
Confirm validation feedback updates dynamically
Fill form with valid data
Submit the form
Check form submission triggers API call
Verify display of confirmation message on successful submission
Simulate API failure response
Confirm proper error message is displayed and user can retry

title: Footer Reveal Animation on Hover and Tap
description: Ensure footer magic brick reveal animation triggers on hover (desktop) and tap (mobile) revealing contact and social content, and resets appropriately.

steps.description: Scroll to the page footer on desktop
Hover over the footer area
Verify reveal animation runs smoothly and contact/social content is visible
Move cursor away from footer
Check animation resets and content hides
Switch to mobile viewport
Tap footer area
Confirm reveal animation triggers and content is shown
Tap outside footer
Verify reveal resets and content hides

title: Site-wide Animation Performance and Responsiveness
description: Validate that all animations including layered background effects, header, hero, and carousels run at 60 FPS on desktop and adapt or disable appropriately on mobile.

steps.description: Load homepage and other main pages on desktop
Measure FPS to confirm animations maintain smooth 60 FPS
Verify ScrollManager batches scroll event listeners reducing performance load
Resize or switch device to mobile viewport
Check that heavy animations (hero, background layers) are disabled or optimized for mobile
Verify no dropped frames or janky animations on mobile

title: Accessibility Compliance Across Site
description: Ensure semantic HTML, keyboard navigation support, visible focus states, ARIA attributes, and WCAG AA contrast levels are met throughout the website.

steps.description: Navigate through the entire site using only keyboard (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, Space)
Confirm all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard
Check focus indication is visible and logical on all interactive controls
Use accessibility tools to verify presence and correctness of ARIA roles and attributes
Test color contrast of text and interactive elements meet WCAG AA standards
Validate semantic correctness of HTML tags for main content, navigation, forms, and landmarks

title: Cross-Browser and Responsive Layout Consistency
description: Confirm the website layout and functionality remain consistent without visual overlap or broken elements across popular browsers and device screen sizes.

steps.description: Open all major pages in latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge on desktop
Verify correct layout rendering, no overlap or clipping of content
Test main interactive components (navigation, carousels, forms) on each browser
Confirm consistent behavior and styles
Repeat testing on mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Chrome on Android)
Check responsive layout adapts properly and no content overflow or hidden elements

title: Performance and Load Time Validation
description: Verify that the website meets performance targets including main thread JS load time ≤ 500ms and optimized Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) and First Contentful Paint (FCP).

steps.description: Load homepage and other critical pages
Measure main thread JavaScript load time and confirm it is less than or equal to 500ms
Ensure LCP and FCP metrics meet the defined acceptable thresholds
Validate lazy loading of images and code splitting occur as expected

title: CI/CD Pipeline Validation
description: Confirm that linting, testing, build, and deployment processes complete successfully in the CI/CD pipeline for staging and production environments.

steps.description: Trigger a change and push to repository
Verify linting passes with no errors
Validate all automated tests run and pass
Confirm successful build of the project artifacts
Check automated deployment completes to staging environment
Promote build to production
Confirm successful production deployment without errors
